reporter_caption.center: IMPERATOR REALTY CO., v. TESREMOS REALTY CORP., 181 App. Div. 888 (1917)

caption.center: IMPERATOR REALTY COMPANY, INC., Appellant, v. TESREMOS REALTY CORPORATION
and Others, Defendants. EDMOND F. McCARTHY, Receiver, Respondent.

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, Second Department.

opinion.opinion_text: Appeal dismissed by default, with ten dollars costs and disbursements. Thomas, Stapleton, Rich and Blackmar, JJ., concurred.
